import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import Dropdown from '../lib/dropdown';
import DropdownItem from '../lib/dropdown-item';

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"dropdown"}}>{`Dropdown`}</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"example"}}>{`Example`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={0} __code={'() => {\n  class Example extends React.Component {\n    componentWillMount() {\n      this.setState({ value: \'\' })\n    }\n    render() {\n      return (\n        <Dropdown\n          placeholder=\"Select language...\"\n          id=\"language\"\n          value={this.state.value}\n          onValueChange={value => this.setState({ value })}\n        >\n          <DropdownItem id=\"language_nl\" name=\"nl\" value=\"nl\">\n            Dutch\n          </DropdownItem>\n          <DropdownItem id=\"language_en\" name=\"en\" value=\"en\">\n            English\n          </DropdownItem>\n        </Dropdown>\n      )\n    }\n  }\n\n  return <Example />\n}'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Dropdown,DropdownItem}}>
    {() => {
        class Example extends React.Component {
            componentWillMount() {
                this.setState({ value: '' });
            }
        render() {
            return (
                <Dropdown
                    placeholder="Select language..."
                    id="language"
                    value={this.state.value}
                    onValueChange={value => this.setState({ value })}
                >
                    <DropdownItem
                        id="language_nl"
                        name="nl"
                        value="nl"
                    >
                        Dutch
                    </DropdownItem>
                    <DropdownItem
                        id="language_en"
                        name="en"
                        value="en"
                    >
                        English
                    </DropdownItem>
                </Dropdown>
            );
        }
    }

    return <Example />;
}}
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"dropdown-1"}}>{`Dropdown`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>

</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
